description: This Java source file defines a custom exception class named InvalidBankingUserException, which extends SimpleBankingGlobalException. The class includes a constructor that takes a message and a code as parameters and passes them to the superclass constructor.

classes.name: InvalidBankingUserException
classes.description: A custom exception class indicating an invalid banking user error.

methods.name: InvalidBankingUserException
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a message and a code.
